parts.str: Have you experienced any symptoms recently?
When you filled in the previous questionnaire, you indicated that you were still ill. Are the symptoms you are reporting now part of the same episode?
Please select the symptoms you experienced:
When did the first symptoms appear?
The selected date must be posterior to symptoms' start date:
The selected date must be posterior to symptoms' start date:
The selected date must be anterior to symptoms' end date:
The selected date must be posterior to symptoms' start date:
The selected date must be posterior to symptoms' start date:
Did you measure your temperature and if so, what was the temperature?
I don't know / I don't remember
Because of your symptoms, did you seek any medical care (face-to-face visit or teleconsult)?
Please indicate which medical care option you sought:
Did you seek any other forms of care or interventions?
Which other forms of care or interventions did you seek?
Did you have any test taken for this illness?
What was the result for your Influenza test?
What type of test did you take for Influenza?
When did you get tested for Influenza?
The selected date must be posterior to symptoms' start date:
The selected date must be posterior to symptoms' start date:
What was the result for your Covid test?
What type of test did you take for Covid?
When did you get tested for Covid?
The selected date must be posterior to symptoms' start date:
The selected date must be posterior to symptoms' start date:
Did you take any medication for these symptoms?
Pain Killers (e.g. paracetamol, ibuprofen, aspirin etc)
I don't know / I don't remember
Did you change your daily routine because of your illness?
Did you take time off work or school as a result of your illness?
If yes, how many days of school or work did you take off?
